main event: Two observers reported seeing a bright aluminum spherical object over Red River Arsenal in Texarkana, Texas, on June 27, 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as being oval-shaped, resembling the upper portion of an automobile with fins., It appeared to be approximately the size of an ordinary automobile., The sighting lasted about 4 to 5 seconds without any sound or trail., The observers were reputable citizens employed by Red River Arsenal., Weather conditions were clear with the sun shining at the time of the sighting.
witness description: employees of Red River Arsenal, reputable citizens of high standing in the community
